information: The company H. & B. BLUMENTHAL GMBH, is a Manufacturer/ Producer, founded in 1922, which operates in the Vegetables, edible roots and tubers industry. It also operates in the Indoor and greenhouse plants, floristry, Nurseries, Textile plants, and Structural work industries. It is based in Putlitz, Germany.
